pkgmetadata.longdescription: Replaces the built-in robotsparser with aRFC-conformant implementation that supports modern robots.txt constructs likeSitemaps, Allow, and Crawl-delay. Main features:- Memoization of fetched robots.txt- Expiration taken from the `Expires` header- Batch queries- Configurable user agent for fetching robots.txt- Automatic refetching based on expiration
